Ismaël SANE

Fullstack webdeveloper Ruby & JavaScript

My name is Ismael SANE. I have a Bachelor degree in project management from Digitale Campus and I am a self-taught full stack web developer since 2 years now. I did Le Wagon Bordeaux coding bootcamp and I am a member of both Learn Enough society and codecademy pro. I have done a 6 months internship as a fullstack Ruby webdeveloper junior at Digitale Seiten at Berlin.

The role of a webdevloper is very interesting to me. Working in the tech industry is one of the most challenging but rewarding jobs you can do. I think tech is the new literacy and coding is one of the most valuable skill you can learn in the 21st century.

More about myself:

Learning new things is entirely part of my life. I have a good sens of technical sophistication, which includes both "hard skills" like coding, command lines, and version control, and "soft skills" like guessing keyboard shortcuts, Googling error messages, and knowing when to just reboot the darn thing.

Devenir développeur web.

by: Ismael SANE - November 04, 2016

Consider the subtleness of the sea; how its most dreaded creatures glide under water, unapparent for the most part, and treacherously hidden beneath the loveliest tints of azure. Consider also the devilish brilliance and beauty of many of its most remorseless tribes, as the dainty embellished shape of many species of sharks.

MAIN PROJECTS

During my learning journey as a web developer I learned all about Ruby, SQL, and the Rails application framework. I have developed my front-end skills by using advanced CSS patterns - flexbox, CSS grid - and went deeper into Javascript and ES6 - I have built this portfolio using jekyll framework - I know how to work alone but I rather be part of a team and adopt a technical workflow.
